Posts.Content: drizou wrote: Dear all, My mother just got operated for breast cancer and not all the results are back yet.Only that the tumor was malignant and they removed some lymph nodes also.  The doctor told her that there is no metastasis (from what he could see form the exams). The question is: is it possible the cancer cells already to be transferred to the rest of the body? If yes, will the chemo kill them? Is there a chance for metastasis even after chemo? Thank you in advance, Despoina Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Cancer cells expansion drizou farmerlucy

Posts.Content: drizou wrote: Dear all, My mother was diagnosed with Stage III & grade 3 breast cancer, no metastasis. Surgery is done and now she is on the second chemo.  As you can imagine i lost the earth under my feet and i dont know what to do. My mother is a very positive person and she says is just a disease. But i am very worried. Will she survive?  Thank you all, Despina Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stage III & grade 3 drizou kellyqaili

Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2014 12:49AM drizou wrote: Thank you all for the support! I will try my best to remain positive. Ευχαριστώ!
Posts.Title: Stage III & grade 3 drizou kellyqaili

Posts.Content: Sep 29, 2014 03:56AM drizou wrote: Dear all, I would like to give you an update on my moms progress. She is almost done with the chemo (2 more to go). She had a mastectomy in the mean time. Doctors were positive. She is HER2 negative. And of we go for radiation. My mom is strong and positive, but i can not fight my depression and fear. Can she survive? I repeat the question all the time in my mind. In front of her i am positive and happy. Thanks for listening to me, Despoina
Posts.Title: Stage III & grade 3 drizou kellyqaili
